Name: Lumidouce Harbor Type-05 Combine Lifter
Desc: A uniquely designed single-armed crane that can be found in Fontaine's harbors. It has modular components and can carry all manner of items safely, whether they be heavy or light. While the cost of building this item is not insignificant and it can be quite tough to assemble and adjust, its excellent performance has made it a mainstay for moving loads in Fontainian harbors.\nIt is said when this machine type was first placed in Lumidouce Harbor, it completed a full day's workload work in half a day, and soon after, it became more and more common throughout Fontaine's harbors...
